text: {{Infobox writer | name = Kentaro Miura | image = | caption = | birth_date = | birth_place = Chiba, Chiba, Japan | death_date = | death_place = | occupation = Manga artist | years_active = 1976â€“2021 | notableworks = Berserk | awards = Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize (2002) | genre = Dark fantasy }} (July 11, 1966May 6, 2021) was a Japanese manga artist. He was best known for his popular dark fantasy manga Berserk and is one of the best-selling manga series of all time. In 2002, Miura received the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize.
